summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Neuronova website. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate). Frontend works well with minor UI overlay issues in quote modal and mobile menu positioning.

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay interception prevents clicking CTA quote button when modal is open
ui_bugs.details: Modal elements intercept pointer events, preventing interaction with buttons behind modal overlay

ui_bugs.issue: Mobile menu toggle button is outside viewport on mobile view
ui_bugs.details: Button positioning issue when viewport is set to mobile size (390x844)

passed_tests: All 6 services API endpoint returns correct data
Testimonials API returns 4+ testimonials with proper structure
API validation for invalid form data (422 responses)
Homepage loads with hero section and navigation
Navigation between all pages (Home, Services, About, Contact)
Services page displays all 6 services correctly
Quote modal opens from service cards
About page shows both founders (Jordan Leko & David Ntumba)
Contact page displays Google Maps iframe
Contact form submission with success notification
Quote form fills and submits successfully (first attempt)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix modal overlay z-index conflicts in QuoteModal component and mobile menu toggle positioning for mobile viewport. Both are medium priority UI issues that don't break core functionality but affect user experience.
